div.p: Aim of the project: characteriza+on of the influenza genome encapsida+on by the viral nucleoprotein NP. We established a protocol to recons+tute nucleocapsid-like par+cles in vitro and we had promising preliminary cryo-EM data. With this session we largely increased the number of movies collected and thus the number of par+cles (session 02-04/11/22). This strategy permiKed the selec+on of the straightest helical par+cles which enabled the reconstruc+on of the RNA-NP complex in the context of the RNP-like helix at 8.7 Å (and a local reconstruc+on at 5.3 Å). These results revealed interes+ng details of the NP-RNA and NP-NP interac+on and provide novel insights on influenza genome encapsida+on. A publica+on describing that structure is currently submiKed.
